attributes.action: take notice of the e-petitions, nothing seems to be happening with these things!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we need the government to take notice to these petitions, why put up a website and do nothing the voting public is asking?

take for instance the vehicle tracking petition, with almost 700,000 people signing it as a concern it has already been disregarded by the government as being inconsequential.

this is democracy in action, we need the government to aknowledge the petitions put here rather than ignoring and doing as they like!

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
